confirmation: Are you sure tou want to move now?
corruption: Something is corrupted, cannot use AES
tooLarge: Data sent too large. Try using files of size less than 1MB
confidence: This is the confidence level that Whigi grants to this user, ranging from 0 (very poor) to 9 (excellent).
reload: The Google service cannot be reached, let us retry after refreshing the page
login.title: Login to your account
login.resetSent: You will receive a reset link when all key parts are available from different sources!
login.forgot3: Enter your username below to recover your password.
login.sign: Enter the new account details below:
login.noLogin: Cannot log in. Verify your credentials
login.noSignup: Server refused creation. Try another username?
login.recuperable: Create an account whose password can be recovered later
login.safe: Refer to a friend for password recovery. This is the safest method
login.use_file: Use a file as auth mechanism.
login.password_file: File whose contents will be used as password (use a small file!)
login.usedWhigi: You used a username that is reserved
login.badChars: Bad characters used: only can use letters and digits
login.names: Please fill first and last names
profile.revoke: Revoke accesses to all granted vaults
profile.warnChange: Password changed, but recovery options not
profile.doChange: Think about changing username and password to your needs
profile.explain: This wizard allows you to revoke all the vaults you may have given to a user with one single action. You cannot revoke shares made to Whigi instances.
profile.confirm: Are you sure you want to remove all access to the next user?:
filesystem.exists: This data already exists, edit it instead
filesystem.generics: This data is a generic one, use the dedicated interface
dataview.long: Too long for decrypting in preview
dataview.noGrant: Could not register grant. Check ID?
dataview.meOnly: Data changed for you but not in vaults...
dataview.revokeAll: Revoke all vaults for this data
dataview.revokeKey: This share allows you to recover your password. Are you sure you want to delete it?
dataview.remove: Are you sure you want to remove this data?
vaultview.noData: Cannot retrieve such vault. Maybe access was revoked...
reset.noReset: Cannot reset password using this recovered password
reset.received: Cannot prepare for helping, try manually?
reset.noLink: Link expired, try asking for a new one
oauth.question: OAuth authorization request
oauth.explain: By accepting a request, you provide the app that sent you here permission of reading only to the data or folder listed below. TO  LIST IT, THE APP WILL HAVE YOUR MASTER KEY. You will be able to revoke this access at any time later from your profile, but the app might have copied your data by then.
oauth.for_id: App name as given to us:
account.question: Requests for access creation
account.explain: By accepting the request, you do the same as creating manually a vault of the listed data below towards the given ID. The remote user WILL NOT receive your keys.
account.err: Something went wrong somewhere, but we'll prove as much as we can
account.until: The data will be available to the 3rd party until:
account.forever: The data will ALWAYS be available to 3rd party, but you can revoke this.
account.withAccount: The 3rd party also asks to create you an account at his side.
account.fill: Please fill all required data before submitting
userinfo.title: Information about the user
userinfo.name: Organization name:
merge.title: Merge an account
merge.erase: Keep this data rather than mine
merge.relog: Your account needs to relog now
merge.explain: When merging accounts, you enter here an account and copy all of its contents to your profile. The data this account had and how it shared it is perfetcly transferred, however, the data shared to it cannot be directly redirected. Updates on the shared data will be done to this account, but you will not have access to it in the mean time. Therefore, if your to-be-merged account has password recovery keys, we encourage you to ask the sharer to update them.
generics.title: Create here your generic data
generics.regexp: Your input does not match expected format
generics.badpostcode: Your postal code does not match expected format
